titleStmt.title: The doctrine and discipline of the Kirke of Scotland as it was formerly set forth by publicke authority and at this present commanded there to be practised in the said kirke, anno 1641 : together vvith some acts of generall assemblies clearing and confirming the same : as also an act of Parliament by the King and three estates of Scotland for rectifying of the said discipline : the first and second booke.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland.
Church of Scotland. General Assembly.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Rob. Young ... and are to be sold by John Sweeting ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
